channel.title: Cant login :O
channel.description: I changed localhost ip to my no-ip and compiled it, i have portforwarded... I cant still login to my server? Please help me!!! I am a starter.

item.title: Cant login :O
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

[quote=“sume, post:5, topic:438859”][quote author=Thanks link=topic=541567.msg3967330#msg3967330 date=1333838587]
Do you have utorrent up or something like that(sometimes it makes it so you cant log in …) also does your ip change a lot(for example if your ip is 1.1.1.1 sometimes it changes to 1.1.1.3 or similar[even though ips are 192.168.0.1 or similar])
[/quote]
Yes i have utorrent. Should i delete it?[/quote]

did u do what i said?
can you connect to it on localhost like turn on the server and client with localhost on your own computer make sure the ports are the same also if your talking about someone else trying to connect to your server then they have to use the no-ip client so make 2 different clients one for you and one for players make sure you portforeward you can probably use utorrent to do it

Read full topic

item.title: Cant login :O
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

sume:

I changed localhost ip to my no-ip and compiled it, i have portforwarded… I cant still login to my server? Please help me!!! I am a starter.

your client has to have localhost but the one you give out has to have the no-ip so the one you play on has to have localhost

Read full topic

item.title: Cant login :O
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

open the client.java file in your client folder Search for server and everything with numbers such as 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 change to your noip then compile.

Read full topic
